text: Varu abad'dhanni vinevaru mariyu nisid'dhamaina danini tinevaru. Kavuna varu ni vaddaku (n'yayaniki) vaste, nivu (istapadite) vari madhya tirpu ceyi, leda mukham trippuko. Nivu vari nundi vimukhudavaite varu nikemi hani ceya leru. Nivu vari madhya tirpu ceste, n'yayanga matrame tirpu ceyi. Niscayanga, allah n'yayabad'dhulaina varini premistadu
